briefTitle: Validation of the AVAPS AE Algorithm in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age â‰¥ 21
* Diagnosis of COPD
* Currently using Bilevel device for COPD-OSA overlap syndrome
* Ability to provide consent
* Documentation of medical stability by PI

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects, who are acutely ill, medically complicated or who are medically unstable.
* Subjects in whom PAP therapy is otherwise medically contraindicated.
* Subjects who have had surgery of the upper airway, nose, sinus, or middle ear within the previous 90 days.
* Subjects with untreated, non-OSA sleep disorders, including but not limited to; insomnia, periodic limb movement syndrome, or restless legs syndrome (PLMI \> 10).

outcomeMeasures.title: Control of Nocturnal Hypoventilation
outcomeMeasures.description: transcutaneous CO2 recording from overnight sleep study whilst using the device at 6 weeks compared to baseline control when using usual device

outcomeMeasures.title: Health Related Quality of Life
outcomeMeasures.description: Severe Respiratory Insufficiency (SRI) questionnaire. Higher scores indicate better quality of life (minimum 0, maximum 100)
